sentences.en: But there were no models outside the church and the military, so investigators into the train-wreck disaster [of 1841, in New York state] looked to the Prussian army for a model.
sentences.cn: 但当时除了教会和军队以外，也找不到其他管理 模型以供参考。 所以1841年纽约那场火车失事的调查者把目光投向了普鲁士军队，从那里寻找模型。

sentences.en: East Prussian was an exclave of Germany.
sentences.cn: 东普鲁士原先是德国的飞地.

sentences.en: Fortunately for the tea drinkers of Britain, Prussian blue is a complex molecule, so it is almost impossible to release the cyanide ion from it and the poison passes harmlessly through the body.
sentences.cn: 但那些英国的饮茶人士还算走运，普鲁士蓝是一种化合物分子，它在人体中几乎没可能释放出氰根离子。 所以这种物质最终将安全无害的从人体中排出。

sentences.en: Franco - Prussian War: France declares war on Prussia.
sentences.cn: 1870年的今天,法 - 普战争(或译普法战争)中,法国向普鲁士宣战.

sentences.en: He accepted the offer to become a professor at the Prussian Academy of Science in Berlin.
sentences.cn: 他接受了在柏林普鲁士科学院任教授的邀请.

sentences.en: He accepted the offer to become a professor at the Prussian Academy of Sciences in Berlin.
sentences.cn: 他应聘到柏林普鲁士科学院任教授.

sentences.en: It was rich in coal and Prussian zeal.
sentences.cn: 那里盛产着煤炭,也盛产着普鲁士的狂热.

sentences.en: It was the Prussian officers that provided the cement.
sentences.cn: 把他们紧密地结合起来的,是普鲁士的军官.

sentences.en: Macintosh, the son of a well-known dyemaker, developed an early interest in chemistry and science and by 20 was already running a plant producing ammonium chloride and Prussian blue dye.
sentences.cn: 麦金托什是一位出名染匠的儿子，早年对化学和科学产生了兴趣，到了20岁，就已经开始经营一家生产氯化铵和普鲁士蓝染料的工厂。

sentences.en: The Franco - Prussian war had sown seeds of enmity which were eventually to bear fruit.
sentences.cn: 普法战争播下仇恨的种子,后来终于结成恶果.

sentences.en: The Franco - Prussian War lasted about six months.
sentences.cn: 普法之战大约打了6个月.

sentences.en: The Prussian garrison at Charleroi was falling back.
sentences.cn: 普鲁士驻沙勒罗瓦的部队正在撤退。

sentences.en: The Prussian Junker is the road - hog of Europe.
sentences.cn: 普鲁士容克就是欧洲的路霸.

sentences.en: The Prussian Officer is one of such famous works.
sentences.cn: 《普鲁士军官》即是这样的名篇之一.

sentences.en: The Prussian was modified with filing, cutting and epoxy putty.
sentences.cn: 用锉 、 刀和环氧油灰修改普鲁士人.

sentences.en: The simulated results of Prussian Blue modified electrode were well agreed with that reported in literature.
sentences.cn: 模拟的普鲁士兰(PB)修饰电极与文献相符很好.

sentences.en: The studied object was from prussian blue to its derivates.
sentences.cn: 本文研究了普鲁士蓝衍生物作为锂离子电池材料的应用.

sentences.en: These opacities are prooved to be iron - containing substances by Prussian blue stain.
sentences.cn: 普鲁士蓝染色证实为含铁之色素.
